typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movieId as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> MovieParDS
source(output(
		userId as string,
		movieId as string,
		rating as string,
		timestamp as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> RatingParDS
RatingParDS filter(rating >= "1.0") ~> RatingGRE1
RatingGRE1, MovieParDS join(RatingParDS@movieId == MovieParDS@movieId,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> MovieRatingJoin
